channel.title: How do I make custom items go in the correst position
channel.description:
Hi how do I get custom items in the correct spot. This is what I mean.
For example dragon plate.
It gose in my attack place so it removes my whip and it dosent look good how do I make it go in the correct spot. please help thank you

item.title: How do I make custom items go in the correst position
item.dc:creator: @a-person a-person
item.description:
@a-person wrote:

Server side:

It doesnt matter what source if its 317â€¦

2 Files edited:
Item.Java
Item4.Java

In both of them search for Body and Platebody you should see a load of numers like xxx, xxx, xxx, etc

just put yours before the numbers so for example if the id for your weapon is 1

put 1, xxx, xxx, ect

Hope this helps

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make custom items go in the correst position

item.title: How do I make custom items go in the correst position
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

if its a delta base. (what source do u have)

Then go into your item.java and search body, place your id there, next go to platebody and place you id there.

if i wasnt help post what source you have,

Read full topic
